```{r setup}
devtools::install_github("dinhngockhanh/CancerSimulator")


library(ggplot2)
library(signals)
library(CancerSimulator)

devtools::load_all()
devtools::document()
```

```{r}
stage_final                   <- 3
package_output                <- SIMULATOR_FULL_PROGRAM_one_simulation(MODEL,stage_final)
```

